   20: -module(tools_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -define(application, tools).
   25: 
   26: %% Test server specific exports
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0]).
   28: 
   29: %% Test cases must be exported.
   30: -export([app_test/1, appup_test/1]).
   31: 
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   34:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   35: 
   36: all() -> 
   37:     [app_test, appup_test].
   38: 
   39: %%%
   40: %%% Test cases starts here.
   41: %%%
   42: 
   43: %% Test that the .app file does not contain any `basic' errors
   44: app_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   45:     test_server:app_test(tools, tolerant).
   46: 
   47: %% Test that the .appup file does not contain any `basic' errors
   48: appup_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   49:     ok = test_server:appup_test(tools).
